###    Yixing Chen
####   陈一行
</center>
<p>&nbsp;</p> 


Welcome! I am an Assistant Professor of [Marketing](https://mendoza.nd.edu/research-faculty/academic-departments/marketing/) at the [Mendoza College of Business](https://mendoza.nd.edu/) and a faculty affiliate of the [Eck Institute for Global Health (EIGH)](https://globalhealth.nd.edu/) and the [Mike and Josie Harper Cancer Research Institute (HCRI)](https://harpercancer.nd.edu/) , University of Notre Dame. I got my Ph.D. in Business Administration (Marketing) from the Texas A&M University’s Mays Business School, under the supervision of [Hari Sridhar](https://mays.tamu.edu/directory/shriharisridhar/) (Texas A&M University) and [Vikas Mittal](https://business.rice.edu/person/vikas-mittal) (Rice University). 

I study social impact of marketing, with a goal of measuring and improving the effectiveness of marketing spending for social sector organizations such as health care institutions and school districts. I am also interested in quantifying the return on investment in the context of digital markets. My [research](research.html) has appeared in the ***Journal of Marketing***, ***Journal of Marketing Research***, ***Journal of Public Policy & Marketing***, and ***Harvard Business Review***. I won the [Financial Times Responsible Business Education Award](https://www.ft.com/content/d5ca2a09-333b-4f86-9e99-3a3bf1b86c75), [John A. Howard/AMA Doctoral Dissertation Award](https://www.ama.org/john-a-howard-ama-doctoral-dissertation-award/) ([acceptance speech](https://drive.google.com/file/d/11XeDOTi3L4zf0K81VP3sTyOgivz-lghf/view)), [Texas A&M Distinguished Dissertation Award](https://grad.tamu.edu/News/2021-Distinguished-Dissertation-Award-Winners), and Grow the Good in Business Faculty Research Award at Mendoza, and was a finalist for the AMA-EBSCO-RRBM Award for Responsible Research in Marketing ([2022](https://www.ama.org/2021/12/15/ama-ebsco-rrbm-annual-award-for-responsible-research-in-marketing-2022-recipients-announced/)) and AMA/Marketing Science Institute/H. Paul Root Award twice (2018 and 2020). 

At Notre Dame, I [teach](teaching.html) Marketing Analytics at the undergraduate and graduate level. During my doctoral studies, I have taught Marketing Analytics to the undergraduate students at Mays, winning the Dean’s Award for Outstanding Teaching.
